text: «ālahi besewi layi minimi ālaweredemi» balumi gīzē ālahini tegebī kibiruni ālakeberutimi፡፡ (inidīhi) belachewi፡- «yanini birihanina lesewochi merī ẖono musa yamet’awini mets’iḥāfi kifilifilochi yemitaderiguti sitiẖonu mani āweredewi (yewededachiḫwatini) tigelits’watalachihu bizuwinimi tidebik’alachihu፡፡ inanitemi ābatochachihumi yalawek’achihutini tesitemarachihu፤»
